Class Queue<T>

java.lang.Object
Queue<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Generic so any kind of object can be passed into Queue
public class Queue<T> extends Object
Form of list where items are added, then the first ones added, are first ones to be deleted. First in, first out methodology.
Author:
James

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Queue()
    Default constructor for Queue, setting max&current size to 0
    Queue(int maxSize)
    Constructor for Queue where we set max size to given size in parameter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(T value)
    Adds object to queue by creating a node with data and adds it as tail of list. Special case if first item by setting node as head & tail of list
    int
    getCurrentSize()
    Getter method to return the current size of the queue
    int
    getMaxSize()
    Getter method to return the max size of the queue
    boolean
    isEmpty()
    Checks if queue is empty by checking the current size
    boolean
    isFull()
    Checks if queue is full by checking the current size
    T
    peek()
    Shows data of first in queue, but does not remove from queue
    T
    poll()
    Returns and removes data of first in queue, but also returns null if queue is empty
    T
    remove()
    Returns and removes data of first in queue
    void
    setMaxSize(int size)
    Setter method to set max size of queue in case if queue max size ever wants to be changed.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Queue

      public Queue()
      Default constructor for Queue, setting max&current size to 0

    • Queue

      public Queue(int maxSize)
      Constructor for Queue where we set max size to given size in parameter
      Parameters:
      maxSize - given parameter to set max size of Queue

  • Method Details

    • setMaxSize

      public void setMaxSize(int size)
      Setter method to set max size of queue in case if queue max size ever wants to be changed.
      Parameters:
      size - New size for queue max size

    • getMaxSize

      public int getMaxSize()
      Getter method to return the max size of the queue
      Returns:
      Max size of queue

    • getCurrentSize

      public int getCurrentSize()
      Getter method to return the current size of the queue
      Returns:
      Current size of queue

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if queue is empty by checking the current size
      Returns:
      True if current size is 0

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if queue is full by checking the current size
      Returns:
      True if current size is equal to max size

    • peek

      public T peek()
      Shows data of first in queue, but does not remove from queue
      Returns:
      Data of first in queue

    • add

      public void add(T value)
      Adds object to queue by creating a node with data and adds it as tail of list. Special case if first item by setting node as head & tail of list
      Parameters:
      value - Object being added to queue

    • poll

      public T poll()
      Returns and removes data of first in queue, but also returns null if queue is empty
      Returns:
      Data of first in queue, or null if empty

    • remove

      public T remove()
      Returns and removes data of first in queue
      Returns:
      Data of first in queue
